headline: JPMorganChase Announces Intention to Build a New Three-Million Sq Ft Landmark Tower in London
summary: LONDON, November 27, 2025--JPMorganChase is proud to announce its intention to build a new three-million square feet tower in London. This transformative project would enable additional capacity for the firm to grow by creating a world-class workplace for up to 12,000 employees, further strengthening London’s position as a global financial hub. The plans are subject to a continuing positive business environment in the UK and the receipt of the necessary approvals and agreements at a national and
